newsitem.title: USA: Integrated Systems sees $5 mln Q3 charge.
newsitem.headline: Integrated Systems sees $5 mln Q3 charge.

text.p: Integrated Systems Inc said Monday it expects to take a pre-tax charge of about $5 million in its third quarter, ending November 30.

The company said in a statement it has agreed to make a one-time payment to a previously acquired company, Diab Data Inc, in exchange for termination of future payments that Integrated Systems was expecting to pay Diab Data through December 1998.
The move will allow Integrated Systems to begin consolidating Diab Data results and allow those results to be included in Integrated Systems' operating results.
